attributes.action: Stop Motorcycle licence holders from driving Microcars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A holder of a full Category A (Motorcycle) licence can purchase a "Microcar", which is a lightweight, 4 wheeled vehicle (a car in all but name) and, with absolutely no experience of car driving, take the vehicle, complete with unlicenced passengers, onto a motorway, where they can practice their skills.

This is, at best, risky, at worst incredibly dangerous.
